channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump to federal employees on ‘fork in the road’: Quit now and collect eight months’ pay for nothing
item.description: Almost all civil servants can opt to resign now and get paid through September without showing up for work—but Senator Tim Kaine warns it's a trick.

item.title: Trump social-media stock ‘DJT’ up 6.5% on financial-services pitch to ‘patriots’
DeepSeek used OpenAI’s model to train its competitor using ‘distillation,’ White House AI czar says
item.description: David Sacks says OpenAI has evidence that Chinese company DeepSeek used a technique called "distillation" to build a rival model.

item.title: How a more focused index-fund approach can reduce your stock-market risk
Blue-chip and tech stocks part ways ahead of Fed decision and earnings reports
JPMorgan vet and Luminary founder keeps a shortlist of businesses she’d like to acquire—and tells all founders do the same
item.description: Cate Luzio's company just announced a deal to buy HeyMama, digital membership-based community.

item.title: How vitamin B12 could give you an energy boost
item.description: A B12 deficiency can cause issue ranging from exhaustion to neurological problems.

item.title: Half of wealthy Gen Zers and millennials admit to ‘digital shoplifting,’ rationalizing it with inflation and influencer hacks
item.description: Customers are duping merchants into issuing refunds even if they receive and keep their products.

item.title: Truth Social parent ‘DJT’ says it will launch financial services for ‘patriots’
Investors should be buying this tech-stock dip, says Goldman Sachs
